nodes.text: The Venedlia system was a star system located in the Instrop sector, a part of the galactic regions known as the Outer Rim Territories and the Slice. It was home to the creatures known as Venedlian sandmoles.
The Venedlia system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square S-16.
